BodyName: Committee on State and Federal Legislation

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor  -  “AN ACT relating to joint bidding on contracts for public work projects and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof”.  A.10021-B / S.7849-A
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Mayor's Message was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Joint bidding on contracts for public work projects and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof.  (A.10021-B/S.7849-A)

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor  -  “AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to speed limits”.  S.7892 / A.10144
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Mayor's Message was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Golden, S.7664, and Assembly Member Abbate, A.9059, “AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to providing that a representative holding the title of pilot or marine engineer appointed by the president of the uniformed firefighters association of greater New York be entitled to cast one-half vote on the FDNY's pension fund subchapter two board of trustees”.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This SLR was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Providing that a representative holding the title of pilot or marine engineer appointed by the president of the uniformed firefighters association of greater NY be entitled to cast one-half vote on the FDNY's pension fund subchapter two board of trustees.

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Communication from the Mayor  -  “AN ACT relating to joint bidding on contracts for public work projects and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof”.  A.10021-B / S.7849-A
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Mayor's Message be P-C Item Approved by Comm approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Joint bidding on contracts for public work projects and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof.  (A.10021-B/S.7849-A)

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor  -  “AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to speed limits”.  S.7892 / A.10144
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Mayor's Message be P-C Item Approved by Comm approved by Roll Call.

Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this SLR be P-C Item Approved by Comm approved by Roll Call.
